name: Cowboy Lemmings
description:
Recommended to play in full-screen mode. 

WASD and mouse wheel to control the camera.   Click, drag, and drop waypoints to control where your lemmings will be guided to.  Avoid obstacles and reach the color-coordinated goal points to complete each level. 

Created in 1 week for educational and learning purposes. 

Music:  https://soundcloud.com/tanner_howell
